properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first controlled glider flights on August 9, 1896, in Berlin, West Germany, by Otto Lilienthal with biplane glider; cancellation stamp dated August 9, 1984 in Berlin; includes information on reverse.
